short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace "millennials" with "bad dudes". Are you a bad enough dude to rescue the economy?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My friend Andy wished aloud for this to exist, so I made it. It's a very unsophisticated regular expression that chugs through any web page's DOM structure, looking for instances of the word "millennial" (or "millennials"), and replaces those instances with the title of one of 1988's finest NES games.
